title: Forgot Password: incorrect email address
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has selected Forgot Password
AND the email address field has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user enters an incorrect address
custom_expected:
THEN 2 red error messages appear
AND the message above the field reads: Please fill in your email address
AND the message below the field reads: Please enter a valid email address.
AND the Submit button is disabled.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19398)

title: Forgot Password - email with no secret question
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Login Page
AND user clicks or taps on Forgot Password link
AND email entry modal has appeared
AND the user's e-mail address has no secret question attached

Test with username: testliferay1@mlb.com
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters their e-mail address
AND user submits
custom_expected:
THEN the email entry modal is replaced by an alert modal
AND the alert reads: 
This user doesn't have a secret question. Please contact the Help Desk at (212) 485-8787 for support.
Click HERE to return to the login page

AND WHEN user clicks or taps on HERE
THEN page redirects within the tab to the login page.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19525)

title: Forgot Password - email with secret question
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Login Page
AND user clicks or taps on Forgot Password link
AND email entry modal appears
AND user's e-mail address has a secret question attached

Test with username: testliferay2@mlb.com
secret answer: blue
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters their e-mail address 
AND user submits
custom_expected:
THEN email entry modal is replaced by the secret question modal
AND the modal displays the secret question
AND the modal displays the white box answer field
AND the answer field has a prompt: Your answer...

AND WHEN user enters correct secret answer
THEN change password modal appears.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19526)

title: Forgot Password - secret question - wrong answer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is going through the Forgot Password process
AND user's e-mail address has a secret question attached
AND user has reached the secret question modal

Test with username: testliferay2@mlb.com
secret answer: blue
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters an incorrect answer
AND user submits
custom_expected:
THEN an error modal displays a message
AND the message reads: Invalid answer.
Click HERE to return to the login page

AND WHEN user clicks or taps on HERE
THEN page redirects within the tab to the login page.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19527)

title: Forgot Password - change password - error popup
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is going through the Forgot Password process
AND user's email address has a secret question attached
AND user entered the correct secret answer
AND the change password modal appeared

Test with username: testliferay2@mlb.com
secret answer: blue
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters a new password
AND user enters a word that doesn't match in the second field
custom_expected:
THEN an error popup appears
AND the popup reads: Password doesn't match.
AND the popup has a Close link

AND WHEN user clicks or taps on the Close link
THEN the popup disappears
AND the user can type in the password fields.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19529)

title: Forgot Password - change password
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is going through the Forgot Password process
AND user's email address has a secret question attached
AND user entered the correct secret answer
AND the change password modal appeared

Test with username: testliferay2@mlb.com
secret answer: blue
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters a new password
AND user enters the same password in the second field
custom_expected:
THEN the confirmation modal appears with a message
AND the message reads:
Your password has been reset, please click HERE to login with your new password.

AND WHEN user clicks or taps on HERE
THEN login page appears.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19528)

title: Forgot Password - login with new password
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has reset their password
AND user is on the login page
custom_steps: WHEN user enters the new password
custom_expected: THEN user can access the site.

title: Login function: blank field
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that URL has loaded
AND one login field is blank
OR both login fields are blank
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps Sign In button
custom_expected:
THEN login page does not redirect to site
AND a sentence appears below the blank field (or a sentence below each field if both are blank)
AND the sentence reads This field is required.
AND the sentence is red
AND the sentence does not disappear until a character is added to the blank field.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19194)

title: Login function: error popup appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that URL has loaded
AND user has entered an incorrect user name
OR user has entered an incorrect password
OR both user name and password are incorrect
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps the Sign In button
custom_expected:
THEN login page does not redirect to site
AND 2 popups appear above the Inside MLB logo
AND the top popup reads Your request failed to complete.
AND the bottom popup reads Authentication failed. Please try again.
AND a circled exclamation point appears to the left of both messages
AND both popups have light brown backgrounds and brown font
AND both popups have Xes near the right edge
AND popups do not overlap each other or the logo

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19376)

title: Logout Warning popup
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has logged on to the site
custom_steps: WHEN user does nothing on the site for 30 minutes
custom_expected:
THEN a light yellow popup appears on the screen
AND the popup has 5 elements: info icon, header, body text, Extend link, X link
AND all the elements are brown
AND the info icon is a white lower-case i in a brown circle
AND the header reads: Warning
AND the body text reads: Due to inactivity, your session will expire in 00:00:59. To extend your session another 30 minute(s), please press the Extend button.
AND the time in the body text is counting down
AND the Extend link is a bold-faced label that reads: Extend
AND the X link is in the upper right corner

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19434)

title: Logout Warning popup - extend
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has logged into the site
AND user has been inactive on the site for 30 minutes
AND the Warning popup has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Extend link
custom_expected:
THEN the popup disappears
AND the user stays logged in to the site.

title: Logout Warning popup - do nothing
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has logged into the site
AND user has been inactive on the site for 30 minutes
AND the Warning popup has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN the user does not click on the popup
custom_expected: THEN after 60 seconds the user is automatically logged out.

title: Login function: error popups hover
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that login has failed
AND 2 error popups have appeared above the Inside MLB logo
custom_steps: WHEN user hovers cursor over an X inside a popup
custom_expected: THEN the X changes to dark gray.

title: Login function: error popups remain
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that login has failed
AND 2 popups have appeared above the Inside MLB logo
custom_steps: WHEN user types inside the incorrect login field
custom_expected: THEN the popups remain visible.

title: Login function: error popups close
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that login has failed
AND 2 error popups have appeared above the InsideMLB logo
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on an X inside an error popup
custom_expected:
THEN the popup disappears
AND the other popup remains until sequence is repeated.

title: Login function: success
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has entered a correct User Name
AND user has entered the correct Password
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps the Sign In button
custom_expected: THEN login page redirects to the site.

title: Login page: BOC only
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is not a BOC-permitted user
AND user is on the login page

(To test, use your mlb.com account)
custom_steps: WHEN user submits username and password
custom_expected:
THEN site does not allow access
AND page redirects to an error message: We're sorry, your account has not been enabled for Inside MLB.
AND below the message is a BACK link

AND WHEN user clicks or taps on the BACK link
THEN page redirects within the same tab to the login page.

title: Login page - appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that URL has loaded

(URL is insidestg.mlb.com)
custom_expected:
THEN tab reads Login - Inside MLB
AND background image fills screen
AND background image is static (not video)
AND content includes: 
Email Address label and field
Password label and field
Remember Me label and checkbox
Sign In button
Create Account label and plus icon
Forgot Password label and question icon

AND no elements are overlapping each other
AND formatting matches the photo below.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19801)

title: Create Account form - appearance
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on login page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on "Create Account"
custom_expected:
THEN the registration form appears
AND the form matches the photo below.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19803)

title: Forgot Password - appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the login page
AND Forgot Password label has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on Forgot Password
custom_expected:
THEN a new page appears
AND content includes:
Left-facing carat
Sign In header
Please enter your email address to begin.
Email address field
Next button

AND elements do not overlap each other
AND formatting looks like the photo below.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19802)

title: Test responsiveness
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on a desktop platform
custom_steps:
WHEN user decreases the viewport
AND WHEN user expands the viewport
custom_expected:
THEN all elements continue to appear on the page
AND no elements overlap any other in any viewport
AND images stay proportionate (not stretched or squished)
AND all elements function as expected.

Note: In Windows IE and Edge, Chatter images will be stretched.

title: Test mobile
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is using a mobile device
custom_expected:
THEN all elements appear on the page
AND no elements overlap any other
AND all elements function as expected
